thread.title: Pandora to buy Ticketfly for $450 million
thread.title_full: Pandora to buy Ticketfly for $450 million - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: Pandora to buy Ticketfly for $450 million
text:
Photo: Jerod Harris, Getty Images For Pandora Media Pandora sponsors a Lexus Pop-Up Concert last month in Laguna Beach. Pandora sponsors a Lexus Pop-Up Concert last month in Laguna Beach.
Oakland streaming music company Pandora said Wednesday it is buying San Francisco ticket seller Ticketfly for $450 million in a deal the two see changing the way fans find new music and learn about concerts, and artists plan their tours. Pandora sponsors a Lexus Pop-Up Concert last month in Laguna Beach. Pandora sponsors a Lexus Pop-Up Concert last month in Laguna Beach.
Oakland streaming music company Pandora said Wednesday it is buying San Francisco ticket seller Ticketfly for $450 million in a deal the two see changing the way fans find new music and learn about concerts, and artists plan their tours.
